name: Turnipix
description:
Do you like turnips? We certainly do - it is a cool root vegetable! In this game white rabbit cooperates with pink rabbit and both work hard to grow the turnips. Pick them up in right time - they need to be ripe but not decayed! How many points can you gain before the timer runs out? 

How to play: 
Pink rabbit plants the seed (A) and white rabbit picks up (M) the turnip to gain +2 points for the team. But be careful, if you pick up decayed turnip, you will get -1 point! If you pick up seed or not ripe turnip, no points will be added or deducted. 

Pink rabbit movement: E D S F
Pink rabbit action: A
White rabbit movement: arrows up, down, left, right
White rabbit action: M

This game was created during Global Game Jam 2023 in 48 hours. 
Theme of the Game Jam: Roots.

This game was made by an AWESOME TEAM BANANA CAT in Pico-8
Merve Tuncel (programming), Miriam Kocourkova (graphics), Jakub Kocourek (music)
